background.zh: 两名旅客在机舱内发生争执，互相指责对方的行为。作为安全员，你需要迅速介入，平息冲突，确保飞行安全。
background.en: Two passengers are having a heated argument in the cabin, accusing each other. As a security officer, you need to intervene quickly, calm the situation, and ensure flight safety.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 你们两个冷静一下！能告诉我什么原因吗？
dialogueScript.english: Calm down, both of you! Can you tell me what happened?

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger A
dialogueScript.chinese: 他路过的时候故意撞我！
dialogueScript.english: He bumped into me on purpose!

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger B
dialogueScript.chinese: 不是！是他向我说脏话！
dialogueScript.english: No! He swore at me!

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 我是本次航班的安全员，你们的行为已经影响到了飞行安全。
dialogueScript.english: I'm the security officer of this flight. Your behavior is affecting flight safety.

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger A
dialogueScript.chinese: 你把他换到别的位置，否则我还会动手！
dialogueScript.english: Change his seat, or I will beat him up.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 如果你们不停止你们的行为，我将会报告机长，让机长通知地面公安进行处置！
dialogueScript.english: If you do not stop right now, I'll report to the captain to call the police to handle it!

keyPhrases: call the police to handle it

zh: 掌握冲突调解的基本用语
学会在紧张情况下保持权威和冷静
掌握威慑性警告的表达方式
en: Master basic phrases for conflict mediation
Learn to maintain authority and composure in tense situations
Maintain a calm and authoritative tone

title.zh: 与驾驶舱沟通-旅客吸烟事件
title.en: Communication with Cockpit - Passenger Smoking Incident

background.zh: 发现一名旅客在厕所吸烟，已制止并没收烟具。现在需要向机长报告情况并请求指示。
background.en: A passenger has been found smoking in the lavatory. The situation has been controlled and smoking materials confiscated. Now you need to report to the captain and request instructions.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 机长，发现一名旅客在厕所吸烟。
dialogueScript.english: Captain, we found a passenger smoking in the lavatory.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 现在情况如何？
dialogueScript.english: What's going on?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 我们已将事态控制并已经没收了该乘客的香烟及打火机。建议机长报警处理。
dialogueScript.english: We have the situation under control and I have confiscated his cigarettes and lighter. I suggest we call the police to handle it.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 做得好！请写好《信息提示单》后交给我。
dialogueScript.english: Good job! Please complete the Information Reminder Form and submit it to me.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 是的，我马上填写相关单据。
dialogueScript.english: Yes, I will fill out the relevant documents immediately.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 请对该旅客持续做好监控。
dialogueScript.english: Please keep this passenger closely under surveillance.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 是的，我已对该旅客的信息作好记录。
dialogueScript.english: Yes, and I have recorded his information.

zh: 掌握向机长报告紧急情况的流程
学会简洁清晰地汇报事态
en: Master the procedure for reporting emergencies to the captain
Learn to report situations concisely and clearly
Master the use of professional terminology
State the conclusion first, then the details

background.zh: 发现旅客在洗手间吸烟，需要进行现场取证和警告。根据规定需要录音录像，并告知旅客将被报警处理。
background.en: A passenger has been found smoking in the restroom. You need to conduct on-site evidence collection and warning. According to regulations, audio and video recording is required, and the passenger must be informed that the police will be called.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 你好，我是本次航班的安全员，负责机上安保工作，现在对执勤过程录音录像请配合！你是在洗手间吸烟了是吗？
dialogueScript.english: I'm the security officer on this flight, responsible for security work onboard. I will record audio and video. Please cooperate. Are you smoking in the restroom?

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 是的，我很抱歉。
dialogueScript.english: I'm sorry, yes I did.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 请问你把烟头丢在哪里了？
dialogueScript.english: Where did you put your cigarette end?

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 我抽的是电子烟。
dialogueScript.english: I smoke an electronic cigarette.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 吸烟是严重威胁飞行安全的，所以我们会报警，请你在落地后最后一个下机。
dialogueScript.english: Smoking is a serious threat to flight safety, so we will call the police. Please be the last to disembark after landing.

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 不好意思，是我的错。
dialogueScript.english: Sorry, it was my fault.

zh: 掌握现场取证的规范流程
学会严肃但礼貌的执法用语
掌握告知法律后果的表达
en: Master the standard procedure for on-site evidence collection
Learn serious but polite law enforcement language
Master expressions for informing legal consequences
First state your identity and the procedure
Clearly inform about audio and video recording

background.zh: 发现旅客在飞行中使用充电宝，需要制止并解释民航规定，同时提供替代解决方案。
background.en: A passenger is found using a power bank during flight. You need to stop this behavior, explain civil aviation regulations, and provide alternative solutions.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 你好，请不要使用充电宝。
dialogueScript.english: Excuse me, please do not use the power bank.

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 但是我的手机没电了。
dialogueScript.english: But my cell phone is out of battery.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 根据中国民航法规定，在飞行过程中是不允许使用充电宝的。
dialogueScript.english: According to the CAAC regulations, the power bank cannot be used during the flight.

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 那我落地后怎么通知家人？
dialogueScript.english: How do I inform my family when I land?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 如果需要，您可以落地后用我的手机，等您下飞机之后再给您的电话充电。
dialogueScript.english: You can use my phone if you need, and you can charge your phone when you disembark.

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 那好吧，谢谢。
dialogueScript.english: OK, thank you.

keyPhrases: please do not use the power bank
cannot be used during the flight

zh: 掌握制止违规行为的礼貌用语
学会引用规定作为依据
掌握提供替代方案的表达
en: Master polite language for stopping violations
Learn to cite regulations as basis

zh: 提供替代方案显示人性化

background.zh: 发现旅客有饮酒迹象，需要评估其状态，确认是否有同伴协助，并确保其行为可控。
background.en: A passenger shows signs of alcohol consumption. You need to assess their condition, confirm if they have companions to assist, and ensure their behavior is controllable.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 您好，请问您是不是喝酒了？
dialogueScript.english: Excuse me, may I ask if you have been drinking?

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 是的，怎么了？
dialogueScript.english: Yes, what's the matter?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 没什么，请问您有朋友跟您一起吗？
dialogueScript.english: It's OK. Do you have any friends with you?

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 有的，还有两位朋友跟我一起上机的。
dialogueScript.english: Yes, there are two other friends who boarded the plane with me.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 那您能控制好自己吗？
dialogueScript.english: Can you manage your behavior?

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 没问题的，我没喝很多酒。
dialogueScript.english: Sure, I didn't drink a lot.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 好的，如果有什么需要，可以让您随行的朋友告诉我们。
dialogueScript.english: OK, if you need some help, you can ask your friends to tell us.

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 好，谢谢。
dialogueScript.english: OK, thanks.

keyPhrases: may I ask if you have been drinking
do you have any friends with you
ask your friends to tell us

background.zh: 有旅客因个人原因下机，根据安全规定需要对其座位周围的旅客进行行李检查确认。
background.en: A passenger has left the aircraft due to personal reasons. According to safety regulations, you need to conduct a luggage check for passengers around their seat.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 我是航班的航空安全员，请座位号3至9排的旅客检查并确认一下你们的行李。
dialogueScript.english: I'm the security officer of this flight. Please check and confirm your luggage in rows 3 to 9.

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 飞机上发生什么了吗？
dialogueScript.english: What happened on the aircraft?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 坐在6A的旅客由于个人原因已经离开了飞机。
dialogueScript.english: The passenger in seat 6A has already left the aircraft due to personal reasons.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 为了安全原因请遵循我们的指令。
dialogueScript.english: For security reasons, please follow our instructions.

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 我知道了，如果我们有问题的话我会告诉你。
dialogueScript.english: I see. I'll tell you if we have any problems.

keyPhrases: please check and confirm your luggage

zh: 掌握安全检查的指令用语
学会解释原因消除疑虑
掌握强调安全重要性的表达
en: Master instruction language for security checks
Learn to explain reasons to alleviate concerns

title.zh: 与驾驶舱沟通-乘客终止行程
title.en: Communication with Cockpit - Passengers Discontinuing Journey

background.zh: 有乘客要求终止行程下机，需要向机长报告并询问后续检查要求。
background.en: Passengers request to discontinue their journey and disembark. You need to report to the captain and inquire about follow-up inspection requirements.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 机长，有两名乘客想要终止本次行程。
dialogueScript.english: Captain, two passengers want to end their trip.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 好吧，他们坐在哪里？我需要通知工作人员。
dialogueScript.english: Alright, where are their seats? I need to inform the staff.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 他们座位号是6A/B。
dialogueScript.english: Their seat number is 6A/B.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 机长，下机后我应该做哪一种检查？
dialogueScript.english: Captain, which kind of check do I need to do after they disembark?

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 局部的检查就足够了。
dialogueScript.english: A localized check is enough.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 我知道了，完成后会报告。
dialogueScript.english: I see. I will report after it's finished.

zh: 掌握汇报非常规情况的流程
学会主动询问后续安排
en: Master the procedure for reporting irregular situations
Learn to proactively inquire about follow-up arrangements

background.zh: 地服人员交接遣返旅客的相关证件和信息，需要确认文件并协调登机流程。
background.en: Ground staff hands over documents and information about deportees. You need to confirm documents and coordinate the boarding process.

dialogueScript.speaker: Ground Staff
dialogueScript.chinese: 哪位是飞机上的航空安全员？
dialogueScript.english: Who is the security officer on board?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 我是本次航班上的航空安全员。
dialogueScript.english: I'm the flight security officer on board.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 有什么事情吗找我？
dialogueScript.english: Anything for me?

dialogueScript.speaker: Ground Staff
dialogueScript.chinese: 有两名遣返从大阪到上海，这是遣返的证明和护照。
dialogueScript.english: We have two deportees for the flight from Osaka to Shanghai. Here are their documents and passports.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 谢谢你。但是我需要先通知我们组员，请稍等。
dialogueScript.english: Thank you. But I need to inform our crew first. So please wait.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 谢谢你的等待，请让遣返旅客先登机。
dialogueScript.english: Thanks for waiting. Please let the deportees board first.

keyPhrases: need to inform our crew first
please let the deportees board first

zh: 掌握特殊旅客交接流程
掌握专业文件交接用语
en: Master the handover procedure for special passengers

title.zh: 与驾驶舱沟通-遣返旅客

background.zh: 向机长报告遣返旅客情况，提供座位信息并确认后续监控要求。
background.en: Report deportee situation to the captain, provide seat information and confirm follow-up surveillance requirements.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 机长，我刚刚从地服那边收到两名遣返旅客的通知。
dialogueScript.english: Captain, I've just been informed by the staff that there are two deportees.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 好吧！这应该不是什么大问题，请根据程序做并确认。
dialogueScript.english: Alright! It shouldn't be a big problem, but please follow the procedure and confirm.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 他们坐在哪里？
dialogueScript.english: And where are they seated?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 他们座位号是27排A/B。
dialogueScript.english: Their seat number is 27A/B.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 很好，请在登机后再给我报告一下。
dialogueScript.english: Good! Please report again after boarding.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 别担心，我会处理好的。
dialogueScript.english: Don't worry! I will handle it.

zh: 掌握特殊旅客报告流程
掌握表达责任感的用语
en: Master the reporting procedure for special passengers
Learn to confirm procedures with the captain

title.zh: 与驾驶舱沟通-使用爆探
title.en: Communication with Cockpit - Using Explosive Detector

background.zh: 根据安全程序要求，在使用爆炸物探测器前需要向机长报告检测计划和范围。
background.en: According to safety procedures, you need to report the detection plan and scope to the captain before using the explosive detector.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 机长，根据程序，我们在使用爆探前需要向你报告一些内容。
dialogueScript.english: Captain, according to procedure, we need to report to you before we start using the detector.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 很好。
dialogueScript.english: Sounds good.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 爆探已经准备好检测，并且会检测至少百分之五十的乘客。
dialogueScript.english: The detector is ready for inspection now, and at least fifty percent of passengers will be checked.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 安保组在完成检查后或发现任何问题时会向你报告。
dialogueScript.english: The security crew will report after the check is finished or if any problem is found.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 辛苦了。
dialogueScript.english: Thank you for your effort.

keyPhrases: before we start using the detector
will report after the check is finished

zh: 掌握安检设备使用的报告流程
学会说明检查范围和计划
en: Master the reporting procedure for security equipment use
Learn to explain inspection scope and plan

title.zh: 驾驶舱沟通-携带公司文件
title.en: Communication with Cockpit - Carrying Company Documents

background.zh: 从公司营业部接收了需要运送的文件，需要向机长申请携带许可并确认安全状态。
background.en: Received documents from the sales department that need to be transported. You need to apply for carrying permission from the captain and confirm security status.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 机长，我从公司营业部那边收到了两份文件。
dialogueScript.english: Captain, I received two documents from the sales department.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 我能把它们带到上海吗？
dialogueScript.english: Do I have your approval to bring these documents to Shanghai?

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 你可以携带，但是请你在安全方面再确认一下。
dialogueScript.english: You can carry them, but please confirm their security status.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 文件已经经过安检了。
dialogueScript.english: The documents have already been through security.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 听起来很好！谢谢你给我报告。
dialogueScript.english: Sounds good! Thanks for your report.

zh: 掌握申请许可的礼貌用语
学会确认物品安全状态
en: Master polite language for requesting permission
Learn to confirm item security status

background.zh: 航班起飞前的机组协同会，需要通报空防形势、勤务等级、检查分工和应急预案。
background.en: Pre-flight crew coordination meeting. You need to brief on the security situation, duty level, inspection division, and emergency procedures.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 最近的空防形势如何？
dialogueScript.english: How about the security situation recently?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 大家好，我是今天的航空安全员，我叫李明。最近的空防形势不太稳定，目前的勤务等级为三级。请大家按照《航空器安保检查单》对驾驶舱和客舱进行检查。
dialogueScript.english: Hello, I'm the Security Officer of this flight. My name is Li Ming. The security situation hasn't been stable recently and the security level for this flight is level three. Please follow the Aircraft Security Check List to check the cockpit and cabin.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 其他还有什么问题吗？
dialogueScript.english: Any other questions?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 空防预案如何？
dialogueScript.english: How about the security procedure?

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 正常。我们的暗语暗号按照公司程序。
dialogueScript.english: They are normal. Our security codes are according to company procedures.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 好的。清舱后我会向您报告。
dialogueScript.english: OK. I will give you the report after I finish the security check.

keyPhrases: follow the Aircraft Security Check List
after I finish the security check

zh: 掌握自我介绍和形势通报
掌握应急预案确认流程

en: Introduce yourself first to build trust

title.zh: 电子设备使用报告机长
title.en: Reporting Use of Electronic Devices to Captain

background.zh: 旅客违规使用电子设备，已制止并警告。现需向机长报告情况并确认后续监控要求。
background.en: A passenger used electronic equipment in violation of regulations. The behavior has been stopped and warning issued. Now need to report to the captain and confirm follow-up surveillance requirements.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 发生什么情况了吗？
dialogueScript.english: Did anything happen?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 机长，有一名旅客违规使用电子设备。
dialogueScript.english: Captain, one passenger used electronic equipment in violation of regulations.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 你是如何处置的？
dialogueScript.english: How did you handle it?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 我已制止他的行为并且发出了警告。
dialogueScript.english: I have stopped him and given him a warning.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 请对该旅客持续做好监控。
dialogueScript.english: Please keep this passenger closely under surveillance.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 好的机长，我会一直关注他。
dialogueScript.english: Sure, I will keep an eye on him all the time.

keyPhrases: stopped him and given him a warning

zh: 掌握报告违规事件的流程
掌握承诺后续监控的表达
en: Master the procedure for reporting violations
Master expressions for committing to follow-up surveillance

background.zh: 在厕所发现疑似炸弹，需要立即向机长报告并确认是爆炸物后按预案处置。这是最高级别的紧急情况。
background.en: A suspected bomb has been found in the lavatory. You need to immediately report to the captain and follow the emergency procedure after confirmation. This is the highest level emergency.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 报告机长，我们在厕所发现疑似炸弹。
dialogueScript.english: Captain, we found an explosive in the lavatory.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 确认是爆炸物吗？
dialogueScript.english: Did you confirm it?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 是的，我们已经确认了是爆炸物。
dialogueScript.english: Yes, we have confirmed it.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 按照预案处置。
dialogueScript.english: Deal with it according to procedure.

keyPhrases: deal with it according to procedure

zh: 掌握紧急情况报告的简洁性
学会在压力下保持冷静
掌握确认和执行预案的流程
en: Learn to stay calm under pressure
Master procedure confirmation and execution process

background.zh: 发生劫机事件，劫机者试图改变航向。已制服劫机者，需要向机长报告情况和处置结果。
background.en: A hijacking incident has occurred. The hijacker attempted to change the flight path. The hijacker has been subdued. Need to report the situation and handling result to the captain.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 机长，我们遇到了劫机。
dialogueScript.english: Captain, we have a hijacking situation.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 现在什么情况？
dialogueScript.english: What's the situation now?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 11C一名男子试图胁迫乘务员改变飞机航向至台湾。
dialogueScript.english: A male passenger in seat 11C tried to force the cabin crew to divert the aircraft to Taiwan.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 事态发展如何？
dialogueScript.english: What is the current status?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 我已将其制服，情况已得到控制。
dialogueScript.english: I have stopped him and the situation is under control.

zh: 掌握极端紧急情况的报告
学会清晰描述威胁和行动
掌握汇报处置结果的表达
en: Learn to clearly describe threats and actions
Master expressions for reporting handling results

background.zh: 旅客在飞行中使用手机打电话，拒绝配合。需要升级处理并告知法律后果。
background.en: A passenger is making phone calls during flight and refuses to cooperate. You need to escalate the handling and inform legal consequences.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 先生，请立即将手机调至飞行模式！
dialogueScript.english: Sir, please switch your phone to flight mode immediately.

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 我需要给我女朋友打电话。
dialogueScript.english: I need to call my girlfriend.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 先生，飞行期间不允许打电话，请将手机调至飞行模式，落地后再联系。
dialogueScript.english: Sir, mobile phone calls are not allowed during the flight. Please switch your phone to flight mode. You can contact her after landing.

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger
dialogueScript.chinese: 不！别管我！
dialogueScript.english: No! Leave me alone!

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 你的行为已经严重危害到了我们的飞行安全，否则我将叫警察来处理，由此产生的后果你自己承担。
dialogueScript.english: Your behavior has seriously endangered our flight safety. If you don't stop, I will call the police to handle it, and you will bear the consequences arising therefrom.

keyPhrases: switch your phone to flight mode
call the police to handle it

zh: 掌握制止违规的坚定语气
学会逐步升级处理强度
掌握告知法律后果的表达
en: Master firm tone for stopping violations
Master expressions for informing legal consequences

title.zh: 与驾驶舱沟通-违规使用手机
title.en: Communication with Cockpit - Illegal Use of Mobile Phone

background.zh: 旅客在起飞时违规使用手机且态度恶劣拒绝配合，需要向机长报告并建议报警处理。
background.en: A passenger illegally used a mobile phone during takeoff with a poor attitude and refused to cooperate. Need to report to the captain and suggest calling the police.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 机长，有一旅客在起飞时违规使用手机。
dialogueScript.english: Captain, a passenger was caught using a mobile phone during takeoff.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 他不肯调成飞行模式？
dialogueScript.english: Won't he turn it to flight mode?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 是的！这位旅客态度很差，并且拒绝我们的劝告。
dialogueScript.english: Yes! His attitude is very poor and he rejected our advice.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 好吧！你有什么看法？
dialogueScript.english: OK! What's your point?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 我们需要呼叫地面公安来处理。
dialogueScript.english: We need to call the ground police to handle it.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 做得好！请写好《信息提示单》后交给我。
dialogueScript.english: Good job! Please complete the Information Reminder Form and submit it to me.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 是的，我马上填写相关单据。
dialogueScript.english: Yes, I will fill out the relevant documents immediately.

keyPhrases: was caught using a mobile phone

zh: 掌握报告恶劣态度旅客的技巧
学会主动提出处理建议
掌握后续文书工作的表达
en: Master techniques for reporting passengers with poor attitudes
Learn to proactively propose handling suggestions

background.zh: 两名旅客因座位问题发生争执，都声称是自己的座位。需要核实登机牌并解决纠纷。
background.en: Two passengers are disputing over a seat, both claiming it's theirs. You need to verify boarding passes and resolve the dispute.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 请问发生了什么事？
dialogueScript.english: Excuse me, what's wrong?

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger A
dialogueScript.chinese: 这是我的座位，我的座位是靠窗的！
dialogueScript.english: It's my seat, my seat is window-side!

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger B
dialogueScript.chinese: 不，这是我的座位，你一定是坐错了！
dialogueScript.english: No! This seat is mine! You must be wrong!

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 请两位给我你们的登机牌。
dialogueScript.english: OK, please show me your boarding pass.

dialogueScript.speaker: Passenger A & B
dialogueScript.chinese: 给。
dialogueScript.english: Here you are.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 是A先生座位错了，您的座位在后一排，请您回到您的原位。
dialogueScript.english: I think you are mistaken Mr. A, your seat is in the back row. Please return to your seat.

zh: 掌握核实信息的礼貌用语

background.zh: 向机长通报航班上将有嫌疑人被警官押解，需要说明特殊要求和注意事项。
background.en: Brief the captain that there will be a suspect escorted by police officers on the flight. Need to explain special requirements and precautions.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 本次航班将有一名嫌疑人，由三名警官押解。嫌疑人将坐在27B座位。
dialogueScript.english: There will be a suspect escorted by three police officers. The suspect will be seated at 27B.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 安保有什么要求？
dialogueScript.english: Are there any security requirements?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 被押解人犯要先于其他旅客登机，后于其他旅客下机。不得与重要旅客同机。
dialogueScript.english: The escorted suspect should board before other passengers, and disembark after others. They cannot be on the same flight as a Very Important Person (VIP).

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 还有其他要求吗？
dialogueScript.english: Any other requirements?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 不要提供金属餐具，不要提供酒精饮料。
dialogueScript.english: Don't provide metal tableware. Don't provide alcoholic drinks.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 好的，注意监控。
dialogueScript.english: Fine. Please pay attention to them.

zh: 掌握特殊旅客通报流程
学会说明安全限制措施
en: Learn to explain safety restriction measures
Clearly state escorts and seat location

background.zh: 完成客舱安保检查后向机长报告，汇报发现的情况并确认可以开始登机。
background.en: After completing cabin security check, report to the captain, brief on findings and confirm boarding can begin.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 机长，客舱安保检查完毕。
dialogueScript.english: Captain, the cabin security check is finished.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 好的，有什么情况吗？
dialogueScript.english: OK, is everything okay?

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 机长，客舱后部有一箱餐具。
dialogueScript.english: There's a box of tableware in the rear of the cabin.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 好的，你去检查一下。
dialogueScript.english: Go and check it.

dialogueScript.speaker: Security Officer
dialogueScript.chinese: 已经检查过了，没问题。
dialogueScript.english: I have checked it. No problem.

dialogueScript.speaker: Captain
dialogueScript.chinese: 好，通知旅客登机。
dialogueScript.english: OK, call for boarding.

keyPhrases: in the rear of the cabin

zh: 掌握完成报告的简洁表达
en: Master concise expressions for completion reports
